Text: VIRUS!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD. Game would not install completely or run, tried multiple times, even with Admin settings. Ran uninstall.exe from file folder Process would not run. ThreatFire Stopped 2 illegal processes "install.exe" tried to copy itself to another location and "uninstall.exe" tried to copy itself to another location. Ran test while quarantined, virus came back as Trojan. RevoUnistaller could not find program, went to Hunter mode and forced removed, manually cleaned up remaining files. Do not download

@jamdog17: I get lots of virus warnings from this file too.

I am using a legit, up-to-date version of McAfee.
If I scan the .exe file it gives the warning:
"Kkrunchy Packed virus found"
There are no virus. Many times virus scanners flag cracked .exe files

Norton Security Suite 2010 found a virus:
Infostealer.gamepass

Not sure if the virus is for real or not, but I'm not taking my chances.

I cannot say whether or not the game works because I did not continue with the installation after that. 
Here's some more information about the possible virus: http://www.symantec.com/security_response/writeup.jsp?docid=2006-111201-3853-99

A Heuristic Virus is something that LOOKS like a virus. Most EXE files, keygens, cracks and trainers tend to look like that.

It also tends to make noobs nervous... so I think it should be avoided.
Game cannot be played due to a X3DAudio1_6.dll error, and no one has given a fix for this. Not a waste of time as is more of a disappointment.
the x3daudio1_6.dll error is down to an outdated version of directx.  either update dx or do a google search for the file and place it in your \windows\system32 folder and that should fix it.
and as was mentioned -- there is no virus here.  false positive due to cracked version is all.
